name: Dragonslayer Arrow
description: Giant dragon-hunting arrows, resembling iron spears.|Used by Hawkeye Gough and his Dragonslayers, they puncture human flesh easily.|Dragonslayer Arrows can only be used with the Dragonslayer Greatbow, and vice-versa.

name: Feather Arrow
description: Red feather arrows of the Lord's hunters.|Their long range makes them effective for sniping.

name: Fire Arrow
description: Arrows fired with flaming tips.|Inflicts fire damage.

name: Gough's Great Arrow
description: Great arrow used by Hawkeye Gough, one of Lord Gwyn's Four Knights, for dragon slaying. Requires Greatbow.|Gough personally crafts each stone tip, and wraps the shaft tightly with tree bark.

name: Heavy Bolt
description: Large bolt. Used mainly with the Heavy Crossbow.|These weighty bolts inflict high damage, but have reduced range.

name: Large Arrow
description: Large Arrow.|Heavier arrows cause more damage, but have a shorter range.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Special bolts imbued with lightning, crafted by the giant blacksmith of Anor Londo.|The giant blacksmith has never seen a crossbow, but remembers the specifications of the bolts requested by ancient warriors.

name: Moonlight Arrow
description: Arrow granted to those bound by Covenant to the Dark Sun Gwyndolin, Lord Gwyn's lastborn. Moonlight Arrows glow silver, and inflict magic damage.

name: Poison Arrow
description: Arrow with point dipped in poison. Ensures the demise of prey in a hunt, or the target in an assassination.|Once an enemy is poisoned, one need only wait.

name: Sniper Bolt
description: Red feather bolts used with the Sniper Crossbow. Their long range makes them effective for sniping.

name: Standard Arrow
description: Standard Arrow.|Arrow must be equipped to be fired.

name: Standard Bolt
description: Standard crossbow bolt. Used mainly with the Light Crossbow.|Equip crossbow with a bolt to fire.

name: Wood Bolt
description: Basic wood bolt.|These bolts do not fly particularly far, nor do they inflict a terrible amount of damage, but their cheap cost makes them useful when volume is required.

name: Wooden Arrow
description: Standard Arrow. These arrows do not fly particularly far, nor do they inflict a terrible amount of damage, but their cheap cost make them useful when volume is required.
